explains: v. （使）联合，（使）团结；统一，使统一

sentences.en: His aim was to unite Italy.
sentences.cn: 他的目标是统一意大利。

sentences.en: Will they unite behind the new leader?
sentences.cn: 他们会团结支持新领导人吗？

sentences.en: He said "vegetarians unite," and I looked at him and said "yeah, ha ha."
sentences.cn: “素食者们团结起来，”他说道，我看着他，说“行，哈哈。”
